text: Allan Normann Fjeldheim (31 July 1918 - 29 March 1995) was a Norwegian pair skater. He competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics, where he placed 10th with partner Margot Walle. He was the Norwegian pairs champion in 1939, 1946, 1947, 1948 and 1949. ==Results== (with Bergljot Sandvik) {| class="wikitable" |- !
